dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3220059Q] Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Saturday, February 24, 2007 7:49 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3220059Q] Copyright Violation ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright Violation Added by system at Saturday, Feb 24 2007 01:48 pm X-MailFrom: adrianadolce@msn.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Sat Feb 24 13:48:04 2007 Received: (qmail 16656 invoked by alias); 24 Feb 2007 19:48:04 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 16653 invoked from network); 24 Feb 2007 19:48:04 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 24 Feb 2007 19:48:04 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Sat, 24 Feb 2007 13:48:04 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Sat, 24 Feb 2007 13:48:04 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from adrianadolce@msn.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HL2sG-0000EP-C1 for abuse@theplanet.com; Sat, 24 Feb 2007 13:48:04 -0600 Received: from bay0-omc2-s14.bay0.hotmail.com ([65.54.246.150]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from adrianadolce@msn.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HL2rz-000ODT-29 for abuse@theplanet.com; Sat, 24 Feb 2007 13:47:47 -0600 Received: from hotmail.com ([207.46.8.94]) by bay0-omc2-s14.bay0.hotmail.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.2668); Sat, 24 Feb 2007 11:47:35 -0800 Received: from mail pickup service by hotmail.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC; Sat, 24 Feb 2007 11:47:35 -0800 Message-ID: Received: from 207.46.8.123 by by117fd.bay117.hotmail.msn.com with HTTP; Sat, 24 Feb 2007 19:47:31 GMT X-Originating-IP: [70.68.165.129] X-Originating-Email: [adrianadolce@msn.com] X-Sender: adrianadolce@msn.com From: "Adriana Dolce" To: abuse@theplanet.com Bcc: Subject: Copyright Violation Date: Sat, 24 Feb 2007 11:47:31 -0800 Mime-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; format=flowed X-OriginalArrivalTime: 24 Feb 2007 19:47:35.0067 (UTC) FILETIME=[A152DEB0:01C7584C] Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of msn.com designates 65.54.246.150 as permitted sender) client-ip=65.54.246.150; envelope-from=adrianadolce@msn.com; helo=bay0-omc2-s14.bay0.hotmail.com; MIME element (text/html)

My photo was stolen and altered into this link:

http://www.signalf lowonline.com/LolaTimSig.jpg< /P>

The original photo is in my photobucket: http://s60. photobucket.com/albums/h23/LolasPortfolio/

The picture was stolen from here: h ttp://i60.photobucket.com/albums/h23/LolasPortfolio/loni19.jpg

Please delete this photo: http://www.signalf lowonline.com/LolaTimSig.jpg& nbsp;

My name and mailing address which MUST stay private and not be given away to anyone, including the harasser is:

Lola Skye
307-888 Gauthier Avenue
Vancouver, BC, V3K6Y1
Canada
Tel: 1-604-816-3635
Email: AdrianaDolce@msn.com

I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that the disputed use of the copyrighted material is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law (e.g., as a fair use).

I hereby state that the information in this Notice is accurate and, under penalty of perjury, that I am the owner, or authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of the copyright or of an exclusive right under the copyright that is allegedly infringed. Should you not remove the material immediately, legal action will follow for abuse of copyrighted material which was taken without the owners permission or consent.

Signature: Lola Skye
Representative: TyRheaModels.com (You may contact my agency and reps through this address if you need references)

Please, once again, delete this image immediately: http://www.signalf lowonline.com/LolaTimSig.jpg
Thank you in advance,

Lola Skye (stage name: Adriana Dolce)
